PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02612022-03-24,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActFinancial Administration Act
Canada Business Corporations Act
SubjectOrder authorizing VIA Rail Canada Inc. to acquire and hold all of its subsidiary's shares
PrecisOrder authorizing VIA RAIL CANADA INC. to procure the incorporation of a WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARY, all the shares of which, on incorporation, would be held by VIA Rail Canada Inc. on condition that (1) the mandate for the subsidiary is to develop and implement the High Frequency Rail project, in cooperation with the Minister of Transport, and which the mandate may only be amended with the approval of the Governor in Council; and (2) the board of directors of the subsidiary is appointed by VIA Rail Canada Inc., in consultation with the Minister of Transport.
AttachmentsAttachment
